name: Nathan Carter
description: '''Nathan Kane Tyrone Carter''' (born 28 May 1990) is a British-born Irish [[country music]] singer based in the UK and Ireland. He [[Nathan Carter discography|has released]] thirteen studio albums and six live albums as of December 2022, five of which peaked at number one, and four live DVDs. He performs Irish folk and country. He rose to popularity with his 2012 cover of the American country song "[[Wagon Wheel (song)#Nathan Carter version|Wagon Wheel]]".
